artist: Author: Jalaluddin Mohammad Rumi; Translator: Zahra Partovi; Artist: Joan Busing; Artist: Sandy Gellis; Artist: Elizabeth Harrington; Artist: Bernard Kirschenbaum; Artist: Ted Kurahara; Artist: James Nares; Artist: Dorothea Rockburne; Artist: Betye Saar; Artist: Annette Senneby; Artist: Michelle Stuart; Artist: Peter Thomson; Artist: Judith Turner; Artist: Marjorie VanDyke; Artist: Joan Vennum; Artist: Susan Weil; Publisher: Vincent FitzGerald & Company, New York
description: book with cream-colored hard cover; printed text with various artists' imagery in different styles; primarily abstract images; some tipped-in artworks including print (?) on barklike paper; grey clamshell box with embossed spiral on cover and title on spine in white; glass irregular octagon, with irregular arc of white on right side, fits into cutout space on bottom of clamshell box
image_copyright: © 1996 Vincent FitzGerald %26 Company%2C New York%2C publisher
medium: Lithography, etching, photogravure, screenprinting, plotter drawing, collage, and letterpress; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil by the translator Zahra Partovi and each of the 15 artists
title: Divan e Shams
